Package se3projecta.GUI

This package contains classes used in the Graphical User Interface of this application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Allocation Links a together a particular SeatType, CustomerType and numberOfTickets, resulting in a particular cost.
AllocationListener A listener that listens for changes in an Allocation and makes required changes.
GUI Main GUI Frame which allows the entire booking process to take place.
JAllocationPanel JPanel which holds allocation widgets.
JAllocationPanelNavigation JPanel which holds JButtons that allow navigation back to SelectTheatreSession state and forward to PlaceSeats State.
JMoviePanel JPanel which holds widgets that allow selection of Movie, Theatre, and SessionTime
JSeatSelectionPanel JPanel which allows users to select which seats the want to sit in, place the seats randomly or use a combination of the two to select seating.
JSeatSelectionSubPanel JPanel which shows how many seats are remaining for a specific SeatType
JTheatreSessionPanel JPanel that illustrates theatre layout and the state of seats in the theatre for a particular session, and allows seating selection.
JTransactionPanel JPanel which holds one or more JAllocationPanels, and allows their addition and removal, and also holds a JAllocationPanelNavigation.
SeatButton JButton which wraps a Seat object and can be clicked to book or un-book.
Transaction Stores information about the current transaction; particularly what allocations of seats there are, which TheatreSession the transaction is for.
TransactionListener A set of listeners listener that are executed when change are made to the subscribed Transaction object.
 

Enum Summary
GUI.GUIState The states the GUI can be in.
 

Package se3projecta.GUI Description

This package contains classes used in the Graphical User Interface of this application.
